constituent: pipe, bamboo, bureaucrat, house, maestro without baton
koohiiStory1: Japanese bureaucrats send all their messages through an inter-office bamboo pipe system.
koohiiStory2: The Japanese internet is a series of bamboo pipes said one ignorant bureaucrat trying to draft Internet legislation.
words:
管(かん): pipe, tube
血管(けっかん): blood vessel
保管(ほかん): charge, custody, safekeeping, deposit, storage
管理(かんり): control, management (e.g. of a business)
管(くだ): pipe, tube
